alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 15 at 10:11PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gulf, northwestern Wakulla, Liberty and Franklin Counties through 1100 PM EST/1000 PM CST/... At 1011 PM EST/911 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Blountstown to 32 miles south of Port St. Joe. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Orange, Franklin, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Vilas, Eleven Mile, Jensen Place, Odena, Central City, Beverly, Red Hill, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Estiffanulga, Kern, Bay City and Willis Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
